attributes.title: Absolutely Unacceptable!🎉✨🍓
attributes.review:
I am not at ALL satisfied with this app. 😡First of all, the app⌚️took three hours⏱ to download, and once it downloaded, I had to go through another two hours ⏰of updates! 😭😭Then, as soon as I went into the app they tried to take my phone number, ⁉️and they wouldn’t let me proceed 🏃🏻‍♀️until I entered it. 🙄

     So, I entered my phone number📱 for it to work, and then they sent me all these text messages💬 that didn’t make any sense,❓and they were saying that they knew 💭where I lived, 🏡and all these things that I was not okay with. 🆘

     Also, the app 💗was very glitchy ❌and tried to ask me what my social security number 📃was, 😬and looked overall very sketchy. 💉The app had many pop-ups💥 that were going everywhere, and it was just super non-organized, 💨and there were random tabs!🗂

     Then, they were telling me to vote for Joe Biden, 😀so it was kind of a confusing app! I didn’t really understand it. 😒Also, they asked for my credit card number, 💳and I was not okay with that because they were trying to take my money. 💵They said that I had to donate at least $50 to the wall,🚚 or else I couldn’t leave the app. 💻Then, I was very frustrated, 😰so I tried to delete the app, but it wouldn’t get off my phone. 👎🏾

     Then, all the sudden, I got this notification ⚠️that there was a virus 🦠 on my phone! This happened after I downloaded the app. 🛑I think this app is a glitch. ⚙️Now my phone won’t work 💔because of this app, and I was barely able to write ✏️this review. Nothing will even 🔓open on my phone 📲except for the App Store. 🛍Please never download 🚽this app; it is the worst thing I’ve ever experienced in my life. 👁👄👁If I could give it zero stars, I would. 🥰

Also, BLACK LIVES MATTER ❤️ LOVE IS LOVE 🏳️‍🌈 CLIMATE CHANGE IS REAL 🌍 MASKS SAVE LIVES 😷 SCIENCE IS REAL 🧬 NO HUMAN IS ILLEGAL 💗
